an4.115:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam thanam amanapam katum;
an4.115:2.3: idam, bhikkhave, thanam ubhayeneva na kattabbam mannati.
an4.115:2.8: Idam, bhikkhave, thanam ubhayeneva na kattabbam mannati.
an4.115:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam thanam amanapam katum;
an4.115:3.3: imasmim, bhikkhave, thane balo ca pandito ca veditabbo purisathame purisaviriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:3.6: atha carahidam thanam kayiramanam atthaya samvattati’ti.
an4.115:3.8: Tassa tam thanam akayiramanam anatthaya samvattati.
an4.115:3.9: Pandito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti patisancikkhati:
an4.115:3.11: atha carahidam thanam kayiramanam atthaya samvattati’ti.
an4.115:3.13: Tassa tam thanam kayiramanam atthaya samvattati.
an4.115:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam thanam manapam katum;
an4.115:4.3: imasmimpi, bhikkhave, thane balo ca pandito ca veditabbo purisathame purisaviriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:4.6: atha carahidam thanam kayiramanam anatthaya samvattati’ti.
an4.115:4.8: Tassa tam thanam kayiramanam anatthaya samvattati.
an4.115:4.9: Pandito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti patisancikkhati:
an4.115:4.11: atha carahidam thanam kayiramanam anatthaya samvattati’ti.
an4.115:4.13: Tassa tam thanam akayiramanam atthaya samvattati.
an4.115:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam thanam manapam katum, tanca kayiramanam atthaya samvattati—
an4.115:5.2: idam, bhikkhave, thanam ubhayeneva kattabbam mannati.
an4.115:5.3: Yampidam thanam manapam katum, iminapi nam kattabbam mannati;
an4.115:5.4: yampidam thanam kayiramanam atthaya samvattati, iminapi nam kattabbam mannati.
an4.115:5.5: Idam, bhikkhave, thanam ubhayeneva kattabbam mannati.
